acf.title: Global Head of Strategic Business Services
acf.bio_copy:
Stacy Selig is Global Head of Strategic Business Services. She oversees the Structuring, Trading Services, and Project Management and Implementation Teams across the firm. Her role includes responsibility for the structuring and execution of new and complex investment team structures and strategies, as well as driving long-term solutions to enable these investments to scale.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2021, Stacy was a Partner at Goldman Sachs, where she served as the Co-Head of Global Structuring for the Global Markets Division. She was also Head of Structured Sales and Co-Head of Asset Manager Sales in Equities in the Americas. She began her career as a tax attorney at Davis Polk & Wardwell LLP.

Stacy received a BA in Government, summa cum laude, from Cornell University, an MA in Political Science from the University of Rochester, a JD, cum laude, from Harvard Law School, and an LLM in Taxation from New York University School of Law.
